system.description: At 1st level choose a creature type (from SRD table; humanoid/outsider require subtype). +2 on Bluff, Listen, Sense Motive, Spot, Survival against that type and on weapon damage. At 5th, 10th, 15th, 20th: add another favored enemy and increase one existing bonus by 2. Bonuses do not stack if a creature fits multiple categories.
